Search for hidden objects and circumvent unique puzzle traps to recover the most sought after treasures the world has ever known. A newly-discovered fragment of an ancient map is believed to reveal the location of the Lost Tomb of Egypt.

Title: Memory Puzzle - Futanari Massage
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a Futanari masseur and her client, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

Title: Fresh Start Cleaning Simulator
description: Fresh Start is a relaxing single player game, in which you embark on a mission to clean up the world and restore nature to its fresh and colorful shape. Watch as the world changes in front of your eyes as you help animals, solve puzzles and grow plants around you.

Title: Forest Frenzy
description: Shoot to survive, shoot em' up, score attack! A wave based shooter where you must buy weapons and upgrades to survive! Get local high scores or compete on steam leaderboards!

Title: Amazing Adventures Around the World
description: Pieces of an ancient stone tablet have started turning up around the globe and the Museum needs your help to locate the pieces and find the most expensive gem ever known...the “World Diamond”. Under the direction of the Museum, you must immediately begin your global seek & find adventure.

Title: Life Matters - Season 1
description: Life Matters is an Adult Visual Novel where choices that actually impact your story. The game is designed to be played multiple times to see how your choices take you on different paths, characters, and how you change people lives as the story goes.

Title: Furry Sex Madness
description: Take on the role of a brave hero and save all the girls from behind or show your real porking skill in passing levels for a while!

Title: Art Of Air War
description: Take the way to the top, shoot and hunt enemies in the Art Of Air War and be the king of the sky warfare

Title: Crossroad of Worlds: Mystery Agency Collector's Edition
description: It's time for another adventure! Immerse yourself in an amazing world of puzzles and riddles! Become a detective, solve cases and help people all over the multiverse!

Title: The Chronicles of Hercules II - Wrath of Kronos
description: The Titan Kronos has broken free from Tartarus and raised an army of giants to attack Olympus and defeat the gods! Help Hercules in the second part of the epic Match3 game defeat Kronos and save the Olympus!

Title: Mystery P.I.™ - The Vegas Heist
description: The heist of the century has just happened! You've been hired by the casino to find & return the stolen money before its grand opening in 16 hours. Search for over 2300 cleverly hidden objects in 25 intriguing locations to solve the Vegas Heist. Two addictive ways to play: Vegas Heist mode and Unlimited Seek & Find mode.

Title: Ship of Fools
description: Ship of Fools is a seafaring cooperative roguelite. Set sail, man the cannons and battle sea monsters through the tempestuous seas of the Archipelago. Are you fool enough to stop the Aquapocalypse?

Title: Tiny Light

Title: Need for Speed™ Payback

Title: The Slater

Title: Peggle™ Nights
description: Join the Peggle Masters on a dreamtime adventure of alter egos and peg-tastic action. Stay up late to aim, shoot and clear orange pegs, and bask in Extreme Fever glory under the silver moon.

Title: Furry Spy Simulator: Hot Springs
description: Sneak around and spy on women in a Japanese hot spring in 'Furry Spy Simulator'. Your goal? Find great spots to watch without being caught. It's all about being smart and sneaky!

Title: Poly Memory: Birds
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal memory game with birds.

Title: Froggo's Adventure: Verdant Venture
description: A Simple and Bite-sized retro 2D Platformer about a frog on another side-scrolling adventure

Title: Mass Effect™: Andromeda Deluxe Edition
description: Return to the Mass Effect universe & lead the first humans in Andromeda on a desperate search for our new home.

Title: The Fairway Club
description: Grab your clubs and get to The Fairway Club now! We offer a relaxing golfing experience for any type of golfer. Hit one of our courses or driving ranges, located all around the world, in the morning, evening or night!

Title: Arctic Trucker Simulator
description: Arctic Trucker Simulator – officially endorsed by Alex Debogorski – takes you down the world's iciest and most dangerous roads!

Title: Hungry Fish Evolution
description: A colorful mixture of RPG, arcade and runner, about the survival of your fish that you will love)
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation

Title: Brutalism22
description: This is a retro horror game about the war in Ukraine and brutalist architecture in Eastern Europe

Title: Bejeweled Twist

description: Who does not dream of luxury and wealth? In “Luxury Hotel Emporium” this dream is within one’s reach. Start as a small hotelier with a bed and breakfast and rise to an international economy magnate with deluxe hotels all across Europe.

Title: Pixel Game Maker MV
description: Use Pixel Game Maker MV to make your own 2D action games! The latest Maker title provides a simple, fun way to make games with zero coding! Also, you are now able to release your games on Nintendo Switch! PGMMV: Powerful enough for pro developers, simple enough for beginners.

Title: Sphere - Flying Cities
description: Sphere – Flying Cities is a sci-fi citybuilder which combines strategy, simulation, and survival elements in an extraordinary and immersive scenario. Rebuild and protect a society in a unique and hostile environment. Pay the price for your decisions and be prepared to lose everything.

Title: Neon Fantasy: Monkeys
description: Neon Fantasy: Monkeys is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

Title: HOT GIRLS VR
description: Welcome to the world full of beautiful, hot girls, meet them all, play with them at the party and... Do what you want. Everything depends on your imagination.

Title: LIMP HEROES+

Title: A Dump in the Dark

His family only has 17 hours to locate the will or their Grandpa's entire estate will be given to his cat & dog. You are the world famous Mystery P.I. and the family has hired you to track down the clues hidden all over NYC.

Title: Data mining 5
description: Data mining 5 - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle.

Title: Clicker: Mining Simulator

Title: Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy
description: When your father goes off on an adventure, it's up to you to keep the lights on and take care of your sister.

Title: Defense Tower Simulator

Title: Escape Legacy: Ancient Scrolls
description: New Adventure Escape Room Game with Full High Definition Resolution and High Detailed Graphics! First Person Character control with Realistic Gameplay! Can you Escape?

Title: Dragon Age II: Ultimate Edition
description: You are Hawke, a refugee seeking to escape the darkspawn-plagued land of Ferelden and become Champion of Kirkwall. Rise to power and fight epic battles while making decisions that determine the course of civilization.

Title: Nightclub Emporium
description: Start your own enterprising odyssey and turn night into day as the boss of your very own Nightclub Emporium!

Title: Rakuen
description: A hospitalized Boy comes to terms with his own story by traveling with his Mom to a beautiful fantasy world; ultimately helping his fellow patients find closure by walking a mile in their shoes.

Title: FourPoint:prologue

Title: Super Bunny Man

You can choose different characters and level up to face hordes of enemies, embark on an unstoppable path, and conquer the unforgiving challenges!

With a new experience awaiting every time you enter the dungeon, let the power bestowed by the crown guide you in this challenging adventure!

Title: CyberHive

Odd circumstances lead Kota to come to Rui's aid and shield her from an embarrassing situation. Rui now knows who Kota is, and is now indebted to the young man. How could she make it up to him?

After playing it he got abducted and sent to another world filled with monsters and women. Now he must collect the Lust from monster girls and make his way home. Will he prove himself a Hero?

Title: The Far Kingdoms: Sacred Grove Solitaire

A powerful earthquake has destroyed the island along with the sacred grove. The Elven Queen seeks your help to restore the island.

Title: Path of Sin: Greed
description: It was supposed to be a simple suicide case – a quick inspection and lots of boring paperwork. But the more you delve into this secluded island and the twisted family relations of the owners, the more complicated and unclear this case becomes.

Title: aMAZE Double
description: aMAZE Double is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with portal and gem's

Title: Anime And Your Life

Title: The far Kingdoms: Winter Solitaire
description: In this magical Solitaire game you must defeat the Ice Queen before the land is sealed in eternal winter! Play 50 challenging levels and unlock loads of uprades an powerups!

Title: Tokyo School Girl

Title: Cook, Serve, Delicious! 3?!

Title: Sword and Fairy 7

Title: The Far Kingdoms: Hidden Magic
description: A new hidden object adventure in the Far Kingdoms awaits you! Solve the puzzles and search for hidden clues to find who is responsible for King's untimely death.

Title: Lost Grimoires 3: The Forgotten Well
description: Save the kingdom from curse!

Title: LEWD GIRLS: Hentai Puzzle
description: Discover the best Hentai Puzzle Game on Steam! Enjoy stunning art, beautiful ladies, soothing music - all to make your evening delightful!

Title: Crysis 2 - Maximum Edition
description: Aliens are decimating New York City, only you have the technology to survive. Be The Weapon.

description: Horny Sakura is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process.

description: The protagonist of this game is a strange man with a lamp instead his head who needs to breach out of the darkened and dangerous odd place at whatever cost.

Title: POG 4
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

description: A heartwarming story about the dog life. You will watch, life of our four-legged friend from it`s birth till death. Experience love and hate, joy and disappointment, loyalty and betrayal.

However, the place is a nightmare with no one to provide any blood for Raylan to feed on after he turned into a vampire by accident, especially since he has another hungry vampire at his side.

Title: Mineirinho Director's Cut

Title: Burger Restaurant Simulator
description: Join Burger Restaurant Simulator for delicious moments! Enjoy making hamburgers with great graphics and rich content.

Title: Timber! The Logging Experts
description: Finally - a light-weight forestry simulation that doesn’t need hours of tutorials to learn the basics. Easy to learn, hard to master is the key. Jump into your sophisticated machinery, get work done and enjoy the career mode.

description: Horny Hotel Maids is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

You will meet different kinds of monsters, defeat them, strengthen yourself to face stronger monsters. Be the ultimate adventurer!

description: Embark on a heartrending journey into a brutal, breathtaking world, and discover the cost of saving those you love in a desperate struggle for survival. Strike from the shadows or unleash hell with a variety of weapons, tools and unearthly powers.

Title: Magic Ring
description: Magic Ring is an exciting 3D game that takes you on a dangerous journey through the desert to take part in a legendary tournament!

Title: The Odd Neon Void
description: The Odd Neon Void is an experimental Adventure/RPG game where you become Jack, a man stuck in a strange and unfamiliar place called the neon void. Don't be too sad.

Title: Endless Fables 4: Shadow Within
description: Famous anthropologist Pamela Cavendish goes back to her hometown to face a tragedy from her childhood. When her friend - Hans - was kidnapped by a nightmarish figure no one believed her. Years later, brave and steadfast, Pamela has a chance to make things right.

Title: Time Mysteries 2: The Ancient Spectres
description: Fulfill your destiny, become the ruler of time, and change the course of history!

Title: Lost & Found Agency Collector's Edition
description: Play this great new hidden object game from AVI Games. Get and fullfill orders from the detective agency “Lost & Found Agency” to search for missing objects. Title: Waifu Trainer
description: Waifu Trainer is a clicker game whose ultimate goal is to accumulate currency to open all images.

Title: Get Packed: Fully Loaded
description: Get Packed: Fully Loaded is the expanded edition of the couch co-op removals game that’s full of calamity and physics-based carnage for 1-4 players.

description: Protect your domain, develop and grow it, all while gaining wealth and power! Economically destroy everyone that stands in your way! Regain what was once yours and get your revenge in Holy Road!

Title: Rarity Chase
description: Rarity Chase is an adventure for board game fans. Quickly learn simple rules, roll the die and go in search of an ancient artifact. Find and wisely use resources and bonuses. Play alone against AI, with friends on the same computer or online.

Title: Strategic Command: American Civil War
description: For the first time in the series’ history, Strategic Command will be taking you to the 19th century battlefields of the American Civil War. You will control the armies, research, production and diplomatic policy of either the Union or the Confederacy during a time of innovation and dramatic battles.

Title: Denki Gaka's Bombshell
description: A fast-paced minesweeper game in 3D with classic and arcade style game play!

Title: Succumate
description: From the creator of Summer Memories comes a new game where you must look after a demon named Lilim! Now you must juggle your time to keep her happy... or else!

Title: SOS Zombie Survivors
description: SOS Zombie Survivors follows a group of survivors that fights waves of increasingly aggressive zombies while preparing for a rescue helicopter scheduled for evacuation a rescue point.

Title: Kandidatos Kart
description: The craziest race, with the fastest and most furious Kandidatos in Brazil.

Title: Tharaba
description: Dive into the exhilarating world of Tharaba, Time Each Hit Perfectly and compete for the highest score.

Title: Tide Up
description: Tide Up is a rather dark and gloomy adventure game. Accompany the girl in a dreamlike world of wonder. Collect the pearls scattered around the world and help the girl escape!

Title: Skycliffs
description: Skycliffs is an action shooter roguelike dungeon crawler with fast-paced top-down platforming. Jump and dash across sky islands, fight loads of monsters, and get upgrades to survive the many dangers of your journey. Will you be strong enough to reach and defeat the keeper of this floating world?

Title: Suicide Guy
description: Suicide Guy is set in the incredibile and extraordinary dreams of its protagonist. What would you do in order to save the thing you love most? Immerse yourself into his weird dreams and help him to wake up before it's too late.

Title: Flat Heroes
description: Dodge, jump, and dash your way through hundreds of terrifying geometric levels and epic bosses. Too tough? Bring your friends!

Title: Doll Explorer
description: Doll Explorer is a turn-based strategy game in which players conquer dungeons by combining various actions such as "take one step forward" and "attack in front of player". The adventures of Tia the witch, Doll the magical life form, and Lilith the princess of the demon tribe begin!

Title: Invasion, Tales of Tower Defense
description: Embark on an endless tower defense journey in "Invasion." Procedurally generated maps, unlimited levels, and strategic tower upgrades await. Defend against relentless waves and unlock a diverse array of towers. Your choices shape the fate of the realm!

Title: Mutropolis
description: MUTROPOLIS is a lovely sci-fi adventure set on the abandoned Planet Earth. Play as Henry Dijon (hero, nerd, detective) in search of a legendary lost city. Uncover weird ancient artifacts. And PLEASE don’t get obliterated by an ageless evil. You’ve been warned.

Title: Fairground Power Polyp Simulator
description: Always dreamed to be the operator of your favorite fairground ride? This is your change to take the control! Our Polyp Simulator will let you operate the ride completely yourself in a realistic way.

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Bushou Fuunroku
description: "NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Bushou Fuunroku" is the 4th in this orthodox simulation game series, released in 1990. The theme is "Culture&Technology." Tea ceremonies and the gathering of tea items add a cultural element, while the creation of guns and plated ships express the technology of the time.

Title: Star Stone Splash
description: Simple operation, extremely addictive. All you need to do is click, click, click.

Title: Spellinkers
description: A turn based strategy game, with some flavour of tower defense, RPG and luck games. But mostly a fun challenge! Be a master of fire, water, wind and earth while commanding mages and spellinkers of each element to defeat great armies of hommunculi.

Title: Jelly Brawl
description: Jelly Brawl is a sticky and destructive multiplayer party game where you gotta jiggle, flop, and pop your way to the top! Fight alone or against friends for freedom from a mad king across tons of stages, mini games, and modes as you wrestle to be the last jelly standing!

Title: Battles of Norghan
description: Battles of Norghan is a unique gladiatorial management and strategy game where you not only must recruit, train, and equip fantasy gladiators, but also control them on a tactical grid in turn-based combat.

Title: Need More Troops
description: Inspired by traditional turn-based fantasy strategies and modern auto battlers, we created the fast-paced rogue-lite game about growing a massive army against ever-increasing hordes of enemies. You should act wisely, though: the formation and battle plan are just as important as the army's size!

Title: Lost in Space: Madness
description: A sci-fi turn-based card strategy game in which you must guide your team of astronauts through horror, food shortages while maintaining their sanity, and uncover the mystery of the mission.

Title: Riverbond
description: Riverbond is a ‘shoot-and-slash’ dungeon crawler with solo and couch co-op play, set in a stunning voxel world.

Title: Aurion: Legacy of the Kori-Odan
description: How do you stay a good person when you are surrounded by centuries of hatred and selfishness? Find your answers in one of the best gaming story ever written about bravery, love and legacy.

Title: Ironclad Tactics
description: Ironclad Tactics is a fast-paced, card-based tactics game set in an alternate history Civil War - with steam-powered military robots!

Title: Verses of Enchantment
description: A magical card game where you duel wizards using AI generated poetry. Travel a rich world, meet fellow wizards, collect cards and build a deck that will inspire enchanting poetry! (All used poetry data is part of the public domain.)

Title: Dark Hero Party
description: Imos lives his peaceful life helping his sister Tori run a potion shop in a quiet village. However, when an order is given for all Dracovalis to hunt down the Demon Lord, that peace is shattered forever.

Title: Super Bullet Break
description: Save the world of online multiplayer games from a rogue AI in this deck-building strategy roguelite! Collect more than 160 cute and colourful Bullets as you move through maps based on iconic game genres and defeat enemies in challenging turn-based combat.

Title: Conquistadorio
description: The conquistador, who has faced many trials in his life, decided to retire and become a hermit. Just lying in his solitary cave away from people. But it seems that fate itself throws new challenges at you even in such a simple matter.

Title: Dungeons of Sundaria
description: Adventure through epic dungeons facing fearsome creatures either solo or with a group of friends. Master your class, loot everything, and destroy the foul creatures of the deep! Will you become a hero of legend?

Title: Shadow Brawlers
description: Shadow Brawlers is a local party game in which players control cute, agile ninjas that hide in the shadows. Surprise your opponents by appearing suddenly from the background; attack and disappear.

Title: Toadomination
description: Toadomination is a rogulite, bullethell, looter shooter game that takes you into an ancient confrontation that lasts more than a decade, in a battle between a toad and a viper. Equip yourself with the most powerful weapon, collect capital and meet face to face with the sworn enemy.

Title: Hentai Casual Slider
description: Enjoy this casual slider puzzle with dozens of nice illustrations for you to enjoy and relax. With an open gallery for simply relaxing and some nice voices too!

Title: Sweet House
description: This is a relaxing and casual little game. You need to help the beautiful girls to find their lost things.

Title: The Carrier and Crows
description: Crows have downed your plane and you are trapped at the far end of a remote peninsula in northern British Columbia. You must craft the necessary tools to contend with the local eccentrics and find your way back to civilization.

Title: Royal Defense
description: The castle needs a hero – hordes of trolls are surrounding it! Build towers, save money, learn spells - don't let the enemy in! Follow the exciting story of the dwarven kingdom's eternal struggle against the troll hordes, who want only to crush the dwarves and claim their territory.

Title: Help Me Doctor
description: Become a doctor! Help to diagnose patients. Be careful with the documentation, signatures etc. Decide what your ethics will be. What will you do, when a patient comes and say: Help me, doctor!

Title: Breaking Gates
description: Breaking Gates is a 2D side-scroller action RPG focused on fast-paced combat! You go on an adventure to save a threatened kingdom. Face challenges, defeat imposing creatures, forge equipment and master skills while exploring a map full of mysteries!

Title: The Plague Doctor of Wippra
description: The plague spreads agony and fear in the small town of Wippra. As a plague doctor, you bring healing and relief wherever you can. But ignorance, superstition, and religious zeal make for a deadly threat in this retro medieval medical adventure!

Title: Eschaton
description: Eschaton is a short, experimental, surreal first-person exploration game. Explore the 'aftermath' of a cult ritual in the grounds of a manor in the remote and picturesque Scottish highlands.

Title: BlackJack Math Cross Numbers
description: Tease your brain in this ambient logic game where you have to make the math match 21 as a result horizontal and vertically (because we're talking about blackjack, right?) Swap the cards, make the math, repeat. That's all you'll need in order to complete this game!

Title: Growth
description: Growth is a cozy, hexagonal-grid based soft-strategy game. Explore and populate a procedurally generated world by utilizing unique abilities of animals. Growth blends the beauty of cozy exploration with challenging navigation around obstacles.

Title: Cry Babies Magic Tears: The Big Game
description: Your favourite Cry Babies characters are ready to play! The Big Game is a friendly and fun adventure perfect for young players. Join Lady, Coney, Dreamy and friends in an all-new adventure as they take part in an exciting multi-stage tournament to win the fabled Golden Pacifier!

Title: Doomsday Paradise
description: Can you get a date before the end of the world? Doomsday Paradise is a goofy, multiplayer dating sim about finding love before the apocalypse. With over 100 different endings and 12 different singles to woo- no two games will ever be the same.

Title: Shipped
description: Challenge your friends in a naval battle of steering, pushing and shooting. Keep your ship on-screen and avoid crashing with land to survive. Up to 8 players.

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Sengoku Gunyuuden
description: "Nobunaga's Ambition: Sengoku Gun'yuden" is the third in the series and was released in Japan in 1988 and later in the US as "Nobunaga's Ambition II." In this simulation game, players take on the role of a Daimyo of the Warring States period, attract followers, and use strategy and tactics to gain control of the 38...

Title: Rogue Cards
description: Rogue Cards is a roguelite deck builder, where every run is unique and long term strategy matters. Set in a randomized fantasy world, where death is only the next step to being a godlike deckmaster.

Title: Argonauts Agency: Missing Daughter
description: The Argonauts Agency – Find out how the family turmoil of the gods has affected common mortals and how it all ends!

Title: Freak Hunter A Retro Type
description: Embark on a nostalgic adventure with Freak Hunter A Retro Type and relive the excitement of old-school platform games. This unique game allows you to become a hunter in a world of zombies and mysterious creatures, whether in single-player or co-op mode.

Title: Ultimatum: Casting
description: We were given an Ultimatum. From whom and why? What is the task and what is the solution? If you accept the challenge, you can find out from the first part of the 3D multi-perspective escape room game series.

Title: ! That Bastard Is Trying To Steal Our Gold !
description: Steal gold from the Lerpikon's dungeons! Get rich!

Title: The Cathedral: Allison's Diary
description: Two years later from "The Hospital", you are interested in visiting the place where Rachel and Alfredo should have been buried. "The Cathedral" is the second chapter of the Allison's Diary horror saga. In the sacred cathedral of Sant'Andrea there is something frightening waiting to be discovered.

Title: Escape from GULAG
description: "Escape from GULAG" is the maze game that increases difficulty as you progress through the levels.

Title: Russian Train Trip 3
description: A first-person adventure game with a deep plot. You have to get from Tyumen to Novosibirsk on a passenger train. You can look out the window and watch the changing nature, weather and architecture. You can see forests, fields, mountains, cities and villages.

Title: GameGuru MAX
description: GameGuru MAX is a 3D game-maker that makes the creation of your game simple, quick and easy – no coding required! With all the tools and assets you need in one place you can start making your dream game in minutes! Dream it ∙ Build it ∙ Play it
genre: Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Education, Software Training, Utilities, Game Development

Title: Sweet Desire 2
description: Sexy, hot and fascinatingly! «Sweet Desire 2» is a continuation of the acclaimed game «Sweet Desire». Hentai game for anime lovers is waiting for you!

Title: Doctor Who: The Edge Of Time
description: A new mysterious enemy threatens to tear apart the universe and only you can stop them! Doctor Who: The Edge Of Time lets players embark on an adventure through space and time. Travel across the universe, visit alien locations, pilot the TARDIS and solve the mystery of the controlling force behind the Reality Virus.

Title: Alwa's Awakening
description: Use your magic staff and progress through a large interconnected world where you'll solve puzzles, fight enemies and defeat bosses in order to help free the land of Alwa. Explore and uncover the secrets by using your platforming skills in this challenging and charming 8-bit adventure game.

Title: LuGame: Lunchtime Games Club!
description: A games club’s without members… or games?! Who is this crazy robot girl? Why am I being harassed by this cute bully? Life may not have a controller, but it certainly feels like a big game!

Title: Lord of the Click 2
description: Orcs,goblins and other evil spirits are getting closer, and very soon they will get so close that it will simply be impossible to get out of the kingdom. The king himself is ready to stop the army of dishonor. It will be difficult to determine how this battle will end if you don't help him!

Title: CrazyParty
description: It is a game where you move in a wide map in all directions using 12 cards of your choice, and play against or cooperate with other players to play mini games.

Title: Book of Demons
description: Book of Demons is a Hack & Slash in which YOU decide the length of quests. Wield magic cards instead of weapons and slay the armies of darkness in the dungeons below the Old Cathedral. Save the terror-stricken Paperverse from the clutches of the Archdemon himself!

Title: The Malice Kingdom
description: Explore an ancient world in The Malice Kingdom. Travel the rich and diverse landscape filled with ancient ruins, foreboding forests, and haunting mansions. Discover powerful weapons, befriend Whimsical characters, and uncover the dormant secret within the kingdom.

Title: Tamer Vale
description: Tamer Vale is a turn based card battler, where a collective of Elven heroines, known as Tamers, journey forth beyond the safety of their hidden valley to find and confront the sources of corruption in the land, and bring balance to it using their special rituals!

Title: Hexagon Ultra VR
description: Hexagon Ultra is a classic 3D adaptation of a popular game: Ataxx. Turn-based board games in different environments against talking AI enemies. Fill the board, outnumber the enemy for triumph. More than 30 levels have their unique path to win!

Title: Boxes: Lost Fragments
description: As a legendary thief, your next assignment lures you into a grand and lavish mansion. There you find a series of puzzle boxes, designed for an unknown purpose. What should have been a quick in-and-out, gradually turns into your own harrowing struggle for freedom and answers.

Title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Monsters Overboard
description: Dracula, Mavis and their monster friends are marooned on the mysterious Lost Islands – and only you, in command of lovable little creatures, the Impa, can save them! Explore the islands, discover new Impa abilities, and rescue Frankenstein, Murray and Wayne from fearsome enemies. But hurry – the Drac-Pack’s lives are at stake!

Title: Captain Forever Trilogy
description: Millions of players worldwide have flown, built, and fought their way through Captain Forever. CF Trilogy brings Captains Forever, Successor, and Impostor to Steam with a beautiful new renderer, new modules, and a reimagined world written by acclaimed novelist Cassandra Khaw.

Title: Winged Sakura: Endless Dream
description: Discover. Build. Defend. Survive. Escort. Open endless doors, discover endless new rooms, and defeat endless robots. Build towers, form contracts, gain new allies, and survive the Endless Dream.

Title: Shogun Showdown
description: Shogun Showdown is a turn-based combat game with rogue-like and deck-building elements. Position yourself and attack at the right time, upgrade your tiles and combo them to get ready to face the Shogun!

Title: Olho Adventure
description: The objective of the game is to defend your planet from invaders, each defeated boss releases a different new power, adventure game, 2d platform action.

Title: Suzerain
description: Assume the role of President Anton Rayne and guide the nation of Sordland. Amidst brewing international conflicts, need for reform, deep-seated corruption, and economic recession, you must make the decisions in this political drama. How will you lead?

Title: Violet Bricks
description: Violet Bricks is an exciting puzzle game with modern 3D graphics. Help Violet defeat alien robots across dozens of challenging levels and collect power-ups to become stronger. A game that offers modernized nostalgic fun!

Title: Samurai Vandalism
description: The land of Yamato is filled with cruel rebels, oppressive nobles, and dangerous monsters. Fight as a Hozuki samurai to bring justice to the land!

Title: Ooglians
description: Ooglians are coming! Nothing excites an ooglian more than smashing machinery. Protect your machinery with more machinery which attracts even more ooglians. How unfortunate.

Title: Unrestricted Pest Control
description: U.P.C. is a top-down shooter where you play as a fearless exterminator to solve a small bug problem at a nuclear research facility. With the rogue-lite elements, you must choose your path to the upper floors carefully, while trying to bug fixing in the facility.

Title: Green Project
description: Post apocalyptic survival farming, green the world to survive !

Title: Fleeting Iris
description: Ayame is a beautiful girl from Japan that is living a carefree life in search of happiness. One fateful day, she met Robert, a CIA agent who was in Japan during a mission. They become engaged and move to America together. However, not all is as simple as her previous life!

Title: TeamTower
description: As a prophet of the Secret Church, you will lead a team of characters with unique characteristics. Gain loot through events and battles, use them to enhance the team, and finally complete the great sacrifice.
genre: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Krek Da Frog
description: Funny and relaxing game, player can control the frog he choose in menu select unlocked level and complete eating missions on multiple locations. To achieve all achievements player must eat at least 500 butterflies and open all levels.

Title: Race & Destroy
description: Race&Destroy is an alternative view of racing genre in total. Earn money, upgrade and repair your car or buy a better car.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports

Title: Chevalier Historie
description: The fate of a captured princess lies in the hands of a single woman. Using the power of the spirits and a variety of items, the female knight Jeanne must explore the kingdom that's been thrown into chaos to save Princess Lily in this classic-style action RPG.

Title: GuardGrave
description: GuardGrave is an old school styled game in the vein of BurgerTime. Players must close the coffins on each stage before the sun comes up. 7 Worlds, 7 Bosses and 37 Stages of co-op monster bashing mayhem!

Title: Angry Space Bees
description: Fight against space bees in the endless space teeming with alien opponents.

Title: VOYAGER
description: Come with us now on a journey through music and space... To the world of VOYAGER ◯∘ A minimalist, relaxing & atmospheric experience to chill out to for a while.

Title: Paul's World
description: Paul's World is an Old-School RPG game. We designed this game for mini rpg & survival fans. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing, mini games and more, just explore it! Monsters, wild animals, aliens... Who do you think will win?

Title: INFECTED - Super Soldier Project
description: A police officer goes to investigate an old house where he hears reports of noises and screams, a team was sent before him and they didn't give any feedback, something macabre awaits this police officer.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Letina's Odyssey
description: Letina is on her first mission to defeat the bandits who are attacking the nearby villages. She took up the sword to protect her people, but her very first challenge might prove to be much harder than anyone expected. Will she be able to live up to her title as a princess knight?

Title: People Jumping Tower
description: "People Jumping Tower" is a casual-indie game that tests the player's athletic abilities and challenges them to beat their own records.

Title: Fox Girls Never Play Dirty
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. While traveling in the country of Stivale, Ryunosuke bumps into a fox girl named Serena. Before long, he's brawling with the police, and he gets wrapped up in a movement to reform the country.

Title: Alpaca Ball: Allstars
description: Football with Alpacas! Bring the cup home in this hilarious and chaotic physics-based party game. Play with up to 8 players in versus mode, or tackle the career mode either solo or in 2 player co-op! Peru-ve yourself on the Picchu and win those Machus!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports

Title: Canon - Legend of the New Gods
description: Originally called Feng Shen Ying Jie Chuan, Canon - Legends of the New Gods is a strategy RPG originally for the Sega Genesis and Mega Drive consoles.

Title: The Mythical City
description: Protect the magic crystal, to which waves of enemies are coming!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: A Tofu Tail
description: The puzzle game of a man-turned-tofu by a deceptive fox spirit, the Kitsune. ​Explore the surreal realms of the foxes to help Mr. Tofu break his curse!

Title: Chronicle: Unit Eight
description: Experience intense arcade-style shooter with bullet hell mechanics and rogue-like elements. Use destructible bullets to defeat waves of enemies and bosses. Can you emerge victorious in this thrilling challenge and take down the Space Pirate?

Title: Beneath Oresa
description: Beneath Oresa, a fighting roguelike deckbuilder, takes you deep within the city to confront your foes. As a strategist, choose your cards, upgrades, and artifacts wisely, but as a fighter, turn their positioning to your advantage.

Title: Sujimon Quest
description: A village is under attack by fearsome monsters known as Sujimon, prompting one brave woman to team up with a yakuza to bring them down!

Title: Tempus Rail
description: Trapped in the temporal loop, fight your way to the front of the train and destroy the engine before the day resets. Tempus Rail is a story rich, First-Person, Roguelike Deck-Builder set in the Wild West. Play to escape and uncover the mystery behind the train and its passengers.

Title: GEESE vs CTHULHU
description: GEESE vs CTHULHU - a colorful and dynamic story about the magical Geese and the evil Cthulhu. Incredible heroes and unpredictable adventures await you! Play for the three-headed Super Drake! Fight against huge bosses while listening to drive music! Remember that the Geese are watching you...

Title: The Demon Lord is New in Town!
description: A Resource Management Adventure Game -- Play as Van, a demon lord who has had his power sealed, and has been banished to the world of mortals. Make friends and work towards regaining your former glory!

Title: Family Tree Heritage Gold
description: Family Tree Heritage Gold 16 provides exciting, easy to use new features, including a new Descendants View, printing of background images on many charts, improvements to the ability to sync with FamilySearch™ Family Tree, recording non-traditional couple relationships, and more!

Title: Space Otter Charlie
description: Adorable characters? Check! Makeshift weapons? Check! Otter dressed in a foam shark suit. Umm. Check? Join Charlie and his ragtag team of sea mammals as they jump, float, and rocket through Otter Space in this Zero-G Puzzle Platformer!

Title: Mai and the Legendary Treasure
description: Mai finds a hidden map that brings her to another world. With some newfound friends, Mai sets off to hunt for the legendary treasure! But with countless rivals in her way, will she actually be able to obtain it?

Title: Abstract Driver
description: Abstract Driver is a 1-person game where you have to move inside a cylindrical space. This game is a dynamic action game in which you have to control the camera to the rhythmic music and score points. If you collect a certain number of points, you get achievements.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: The Heart of Darkness
description: Explore the Sanctuary of Darkness, a mysterious dungeon beneath the Kingdom of Haillard. Obtain the soul of the Cursed Saintess waiting in its depths and unravel the truth of this strange world in this sinister turn-based RPG.

Title: Panda Punch
description: Panda Punch is a puzzle platformer game in which you have to control a red panda and save the world from evil alien robots.

Title: Racing Juke
description: Compete against cunning and tough rivals racers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!

Title: GoldenLand: Card game
description: GoldenLand: Card Game is a card strategy in which the player has to use cards represented by various monsters. Each card has a unique behavior with which you can strengthen or attack other cards.

Title: Timings
description: Jump from platform to platform in this minimalist puzzle platformer. All platforms except your starting platform move at different speeds, some even carry the coveted token.

Title: HEX Hacking Simulator
description: Use your communication skills to bypass internet security measures,and successfully hack into the most secure banks. Choose to take on the role as Hacker, taking direction to disarm each protocol; or Control, and relay instructions to your partner.

Title: Made to be Crushed
description: Use the map as a weapon and don't lose your focus! Made to be Crushed is a strategic and nervous local multiplayer shooter. Trap or be trapped!

Title: Sunlight Scream
description: The hero moves to a new city. However, along with him comes a masked killer who begins to kill his friends one by one... Make decisions to build your adventure. Can you stop him before it's too late?

Title: Poco In Dungeon
description: ​Let's get Poco-chan out of the fortress! ​This game is a TPS game. ​Use the actions of shooting, flying, swimming, and catch & down to get Poco-chan out of the fortress of the fantasy world.

Title: Shaolin vs Wutang 2
description: The sequel to Shaolin vs Wutang! Shaolin vs Wutang 2 is a INDIE love letter to Martial Arts and classic Kung Fu films. Made for casual game fans not intended for Hardcore Fighting Game players.

Title: In Shape 2
description: In this minimalistic arcade game, you have to move and reshape your figure to match the passing figures.

Title: Wheelchair Tester
description: Test a wheelchair equipped with a jet engine to see if it can handle various real-life scenarios. Rest assured, you won't need to sit in the wheelchair – we have professional crash test dummies for that.

Title: The Hospital: Allison's Diary
description: "The Hospital: Allison's Diary" is a new horror virtual reality experience, putting the user alone in an abandoned hospital searching for the unknown with only the help of a single torch. You will face true fear in a way you had never thought possible.

Title: Lovely Defenders
description: This is a strategic tower defense game, unlike traditional tower defense, you can control girls and use special protagonist skills in battles.

Title: Nihariely’s Spatial Adventure
description: Nihariely’s Spatial Adventure is a pixelart game mixing arcade gameplay, exploration, resource management and puzzles, it is all about the rescue of a civilization collecting master processors.

Title: JIMMY'S AGONY
description: in time between 1940's to 1960's, we live the Tommy JR Story while he is seeking something he want, is he a good guy? bad guy? it doesn't matter, he will get what he want.

Title: Nifa's First Mission
description: It's up to the young knight Nifa to save her village! Will she be able to do it?

Title: Dream Date
description: Date, communicate, enhance feelings and record good memories with girls!

Title: Mongrel Games Minigames
description: Mongrel Games Minigames brings you over 100 short minigames in a fast-paced challenge to complete each task fast enough.

Title: Depanneur Nocturne
description: A short exploration game about poking around a convenience store and finding a gift with the help of its owner. But sometimes the perfect gift finds you.

Title: Moki
description: Moki is a precision platformer with psychological elements, a story of a little guy lost in your own mind, do you be able to leave this mindness prison?

Title: Trollhunters: Defenders of Arcadia
description: Explore the Trollhunters universe and save the world as Jim Lake Jr. in this action-packed game!

Title: Bacon Quest - Lovers' Beef Special Edition
description: Bacon Quest: Lovers' Beef is a light-hearted dungeon crawler featuring Syren a sexy succubus and her cute friend Aoi. Battle through each stage finding hidden gallery images, loot and hentai scenes.

Title: Defenders of Legends
description: Defend your kingdom against legendary monsters. Place turrets strategically to block their path. Upgrade your defenses to fend off enemy hordes. Become the legendary guardian of the earth alone or in co-op!

Title: Monster Train
description: Monster Train is a strategic roguelike deck building game with a twist. Set on a train to hell, you’ll use tactical decision making to defend multiple vertical battlegrounds. With real time competitive multiplayer and endless replayability, Monster Train is always on time.

Title: Off-Road Paradise: Trial 4x4
description: Off-Road Paradise is the 4x4 trial game featuring the most realistic off-road experience under extreme paradisiacal and impressive environments created for you to enjoy from the first minute in the most spectacular way.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Sports

Title: OneShotRogue
description: Deck-building roguelike Use cards to reduce the enemy's HP to just 0. This is an easy battle because all battles are over in one turn.

Title: Long Truck Simulator
description: Long Truck Simulator is an exciting and challenging game that puts you in the driver's seat of a powerful long-haul truck.

Title: Westale: Peelgrimage
description: Westale: Peelgrimage is an ink-style survivor-like game. Player can evolve their characters in the game, use marvelous magical treasures, experience the mysterious 72 transformations, and synthesize artifacts. Let's get into this Journey-to-the-West world and experience addictive combat.

Title: DUCK's most terrible day
description: A time-bending 2D platformer in the least amount of pixels possible.

Title: Dino Want To Survive
description: Welcome to Dino Want To Survive, an engaging runner game built with Unreal Engine 5. Survive as a tiny dinosaur in a big world: dodge hazards, grow by eating snacks, and steer clear of larger dinosaurs. Chase high scores, discover new characters, and look forward to a story mode in Update 4.

Title: HoneyLand
description: Help Mr.Fluff to drink all the honey, and of course, reach the fabulous honey volcano! Your cards will direct Mr. Fluff in the right direction. Run! Jump! Fall on your stomach!

Title: Guild of Dungeoneering Ultimate Edition
description: Now fully rebuilt and remastered, Guild of Dungeoneering Ultimate Edition is a turn-based dungeon crawler with a twist: instead of controlling the hero you build the dungeon around them.

Title: Suicide Guy VR

Title: Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth)
description: Maze (The Amazing Labyrinth) is interesting puzzle game for everyone. Get ready to face different types of challenges in the game.

Title: Strategic Command WWII: War in Europe

Destroy The Monoliths is a single-player real-time mining tower offense roguelike where you explore a randomly generated map, mine the terrain to get resources, and build turrets to both protect your base and fight monoliths that keep spawning ever more minions.

Title: The Rumble Fish +

description: "NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Shoseiroku with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Shoseiroku," which was released in 1997 as the 7th game in the series. In Shoseiroku, the theme is "The Warring States from the viewpoint of a Castle Daimyou.

Title: 1001 Jigsaw. Home Sweet Home 3

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Reppuden with Power Up Kit

Title: Hexa Turn
description: Hexa Turn is a turn-based puzzle game with minimalist design. The logic is simple: block the triange. So, think outside of the box and try not to find a solution. Try to break the solution!

Title: Membal

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Soutenroku with Power Up Kit
description: "NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Soutenroku with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Soutenroku," which was released in 2002 as the 10th game in the series. Title: Jigsaw Puzzle - Futanari Pool Party

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Tenkasousei with Power Up Kit
description: "NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Tenkasousei with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Tenkasousei," which was released in 2003 as the 11th game in the series. Publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

Title: Super Hiking  Simulator 2020

Title: Kai Entity

Choose from ten girls and pair them with a powerful partner to form an unstoppable team. Navigate their journeies in Story Mode or engage in head-to-head battles in Versus Mode.

Title: Thunderflash
description: Thunderflash is a "love letter" to the arcade games of the 80s. It is a Run 'n Gun game inspired by gems like Ikari Warriors, Commando and Heavy Barrel.

Title: Dictator's dreams

Title: Gizmos: Spirit Of The Christmas

Title: Ramify
description: A single screen isometric puzzle game with over 100 levels.

Title: JUMANJI: The Video Game

description: Investigate your own death, find ways to break free from a time loop, chose a hero who will ascend to the throne and rule the Northern gate! The fates of whole nations of the land of Midian depend on your choices.

description: Playing ant you will have an unbelievable fight with AI.

description: Re-live a dark and haunting tale in this fixed camera puzzle-horror game RE-miniscent of the first generation of survival horror games.

Title: Russian Train Trip
description: Traveling on passenger trains in Russia. First-person exploration.

Title: Search and Rescue
description: Turn-Based Strategy Board Game for up to 4 Players! Search, Rescue, Survive!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

description: Kautic is an action platform game where villagers from a little Town have been petrified and now Kautic, the Bald Wizard, has the hard mission of saving them, but he will need to venture into a world controlled by evil creatures.

description: Build stunning Arcade Centre’s, purchase a range of arcades machines, manage troublesome staff in this colourful and humorous simulation management game. Inspired by Two Point Hospital, Let's Build A Zoo and Megaquarium.

Title: Slay the Princess
description: You're here to slay the princess. Don't believe her lies.

description: A turn-based RPG where you play as Lelie, a woman who uses the power of Dowsing to help people find things they've lost. One day however, Lelie's power gets her and her friend into a dangerous situation that they must work together to overcome.

Title: PieClicker
description: PieClicker is a beautiful clicker game designed to be visually appealing. Click, Get Pies, Upgrade Pies.

description: Walk through the doors of history and visit a famous house in ancient Pompeii. Take a voice guided tour or explore on your own in this glimpse of life in ancient Roman times in virtual reality.

description: A legend passed down for generations says when the world is in peril, seven legendary heroes will come together to face evil and save the world.

Title: Tides of Despair
description: After a shipwreck, you are one of the survivors. To Survive you will need to fight for your life.

description: Amane has always lived for herself, choosing to focus on her studies and happiness. But what will she do when given magical powers beyond human comprehension to face a horde of terrible monsters? It's time for her to become Magical Girl Celesphonia!

description: I paid artists to hide snails and lettuce in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

description: Dodge & Weave is a bullet hell survival game. You must avoid getting hit by any projectiles in order to complete your objective and win each level.

description: ZERO 2 is an ARPG with intriguing storytelling, an unpredictable battle system, and endless heartfelt adventure. The story includes multiple subtle metaphors for the relationship between God and humans.

description: With BADLAND: Game of the Year Edition, experience the multi-award-winning action adventure like never before - redesigned for Steam.
