description: Catapult werewolves over castle walls, incinerate troops with dragon fire and command the Knights of the Round Table! This remaster of the mythical ‘castle sim’ features Steam multiplayer, Workshop support, new maps, achievements and DLC campaigns.

Title: PAW Patrol Mighty Pups Save Adventure Bay
description: Join the Mighty Pups on a super-heroic mission to Save Adventure Bay. Have fun together in 2-player co-op mode, unlock fun mini-games, rescue familiar friends and use each pup’s mighty powers to make the town PAWsome again!

Title: Fairies Love
description: This is a casual gentleman game with exquisite characters. Go on adventures and get to know six different girls with unique personalities. Faced with their challenges, what choices will you make to let them become your girlfriends successfully?

Title: Gorgeous and Fantastic Battle
description: The game describes a small war of the three camps. At the beginning, you can choose a human, robot, or alien to start your journey. You can play this game with the overhead view or third person view.
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: The Reflection
description: The Reflection explores the connection to an alternate dimension that contains all the matter of the world inverted. From the surface, there appears to be simply a reflection of light, but submerging into the water reveals that this world is completely tangible, mirroring the world perfectly.

Title: Stronghold Crusader HD
description: The highly anticipated sequel to the best-selling Stronghold, Stronghold Crusader HD throws you into historic battles and castle sieges from the Crusades with fiendish AI opponents, new units, 4 historical campaigns and over 100 unique skirmish missions.

Title: The Guild 3
description: The Guild 3 is a fascinating trade and life simulation that takes place during the late Middle Ages. Step into the shoes of a citizen, acquire businesses and mansions, produce goods and trade them, start intrigues in politics and society, love, hate, bribe, fight and live through good and bad times!

Title: Stronghold 2: Steam Edition
description: Tax, torture or treat your peasants! Rehabilitate criminals or sentence them to death? Decide as you enjoy jousting over a lavish banquet, all while under siege from the warmongering Lord Barclay.

Title: L.A. Noire
description: L.A. Noire is a violent crime thriller that blends breathtaking action with true detective work to deliver an unprecedented interactive experience. This complete edition of L.A. Noire includes the complete original game and all previously released downloadable content.

Title: Princesses Never Lose!
description: Play as Erica, princess of the Tolinia Kingdom, as she fights to unify the Stivale Peninsula against a powerful, modernized country, that threatens to undermine the peninsula's sovereignty.

Title: Fantasy Sliding Puzzle 2
description: Challenging sliding puzzles with various levels of difficulty, featuring epic fantasy female characters and backgrounds.

Title: Mastery of Fate: Phantom King's Rise
description: Mastery of Fate: Phantom King's Rise is an action adventure that requires timing and precision to defeat powerful foes.

Title: Cards Survivors
description: Cards Survivors is a unique mix of card games, action games and roguelikes. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and survive as long as you can!

Title: Unexplored 2: The Wayfarer's Legacy
description: Exploration adventure set in dynamic, procedurally generated realms. Choose your own playstyle with the game's huge set of difficulty modifiers. Deep gameplay with a bit of a learning curve. Boasting an award-winning soundtrack, a beautiful art style, and consistent, oftentimes weekly updates.

Title: Stronghold HD (2012)
description: The original castle sim, Stronghold HD allows you to design, build and destroy historical castles. Engage in medieval warfare against the AI in one of two single player campaigns or online with up to 8 players.

Title: Overrogue
description: A card deck-building roguelite! Explore labyrinths each time from level 1!

Title: Usurper: Soulbound
description: Usurper: Soulbound is a tough Rogue-lite Action RPG. Players are trapped without a physical body in a horrifying dimension and must possess the bodies of their enemies and other heroes alike as they fight their way back.

Title: Eight-Minute Empire
description: Eight-Minute Empire is the super-quick area control game requiring tough decisions. It’s easy to learn and perfect for when you only have a few minutes. ⏱

Title: Rush for the Ages
description: Remake history and race your opponents for a complete and glorious timeline in this lightning-fast card game.

Title: Adventure Trip: London Collector's Edition
description: If you are a virtual bird but love adventure too, this game is just for you.

Title: HORDE Survival
description: See yourself stuck in the middle of an ever growing virus epidemic. Find or craft weapons and tools to fight against the living and the dead. Build a safe place to survive in this cruel, apocalyptic world.

Title: Raining Blood: Hellfire
description: Annihilate countless hordes of enemies while unraveling the mysteries of the demonic invasion in this COD Zombies inspired bullet Hell. Kill, upgrade, explore, die, repeat.

Title: Citrus Rampage
description: Call up your buddies and enjoy the acidic chaos of Citrus Rampage, a physics-based multiplayer shooter with silly guns and destructible environments. Play with up to 4 players in local multiplayer or online using Steam Remote Play Together.

Title: PLATI NALOG: Favorite Russian Game
description: Attention: after this game you can begin to worry about the ordinary Russian person. Perhaps you will even feel sorry for him.

Title: Mini Island: Spring
description: Mini Island: Spring is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

Title: PERFECT ANGLE: The puzzle game based on optical illusions
description: Challenge your mind with puzzles based on optical illusions. Find the perfect angle by rotating the camera to clean up the chaos and find a shocking story fraught with twists.

Title: HeroStory
description: 《HeroStory》 is a card battle game that does not contain numerical or random elements.

Title: FREAKOUT
description: Freakout is a 1-4 player online co-op survival horror game. Visit your school and find all your seized items and don't get caught by the possessed principal and his pet dog and stop the principal from sacrificing his goats. Stop the Ritual, Run, Scream, hide. Just don't get caught.

Title: Magical Swordmaiden
description: After receiving a letter from her brother about strange events happening in his town, Tanya, along with her apprentice Riru, travel to Cain village to investigate.

Title: Concordia: Digital Edition
description: Concordia is a strategic, Euro-style board game. 🏺 Players take the roles of powerful Roman merchants and follow the Roman expansion with their trade routes, franchises, and production houses. 🏛️

Title: The Journey - Episode 2: Words of Wisdom
description: The second step that you never knew you needed to take to get to wherever you're wanting to go... You won't regret this experience. You have nothing to lose, and everything to gain...

Title: Suicide Guy Deluxe Plus
description: Suicide Guy Deluxe Plus is the surreal puzzle game set in the dreams of its protagonist. Will you be able to save the thing you love most and overcome the neverending whirlwind of nightmares? Now in a new shiny edition.

Title: ENDGAME: Survival
description: Big group of people will be dropped into a deserted island where they will have to survive.

Title: Experimentation
description: A linear visual novel about five short stories, unrelated at first glance. Be prepared for mysticism, gloomy atmosphere and light psychological horror. Not recommended to play if you are experiencing depression or severe psychological state.

Title: BooBsxBooBs
description: Do you love boobs?　A memory & seek game that will test your love of boobs.

Title: HeroTower
description: "Hero Tower" is a game without regular monsters where you directly face challenging bosses. Dodge the boss's attacks through rolling and jumping, and seize the opportunity to counter-attack. It tests players' reflexes, stamina management, and insight into the boss's moves.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Planetary Control!
description: Invade strange worlds with alien armies! populate and shield your planets! Assassinate, Sabotage and Nuke your opponents! Collect victory points and achieve... PLANETARY CONTROL!

Title: Blood Midnight Blossom
description: An ordinary girl named Annihilation inherits a huge debt from her father and is desperate to find a way out. On the street, she meets a stranger in a raincoat, called Catharsis, who offers a demonic part-time job for a week.

Title: Circadian Dice
description: Circadian Dice is a game inspired by single-player deck-building games, but instead of upgrading a deck, you build up a set of dice! Use 10 different heroes and 60 game-warping relics to take on 13 hand-crafted scenarios, in runs that take 10-30 minutes. Lots of secrets and unlocks to discover!

Title: LakeSide
description: Build and manage a quiet town by the lake or expand it into a picturesque city state in this side-scrolling city builder featuring hybrid mechanics. Construct marvelous buildings, epic wonders and become the envy of the known world!

Title: Spelldrifter
description: Spelldrifter combines the puzzle-like positional tactics of a turn-based RPG with the customizability and replayability of a collectible card game. The result: a hybrid, wherein players must juggle the resources at their disposal using both time and space.

Title: Lucky and a life worth living - a jigsaw puzzle tale
description: A dog’s life nowadays. Discover happy moments from the daily life of the dog Lucky with his parents. A new minimalist jigsaw puzzle game, with 6 scenes illustrated by @Katia Numakura with her cute art style.

Title: Bombabomb!
description: Bombabomb! is a by old pre-installed games inspired game, where you light the bombs with matching neighbors to detonate them. The game is only complete when all the bombs have been detonated! When you say you can remove all the bombs easily, walk the talk!

Title: Traditional Chinese Medicine Simulator
description: 《中医模拟器》是一款独特的个人制作游戏，风格和市面绝大多游戏不同，定位是帮助中医爱好者或学生更有兴趣和效率学习中医，并且帮助中医0基础玩家入门。 可以加群 494811550（学习群），697138589（已满），302219333（第2群已满），欢迎参加讨论。
genre: Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Lovelust: Project Stockholm
description: An adventure game/visual novel where you play as a college student who impulsively kidnaps his classmate friend or teacher, and develop a romantic relationship with them over time.

Title: PetShop
description: "PetShop" is the app that exports VRM format avatars with pets & items. Dogs, cats, sharks, squirrels, elephants, dragons, and many other animals. You can also use animal ears, tails and hats. The exported avatars can be used in VRM compatible metaverse. Join the Metaverse with "PetShop"!

Title: Rise to Ruins
description: A brutal godlike village sim that melds the god game, management, and tower defense genres! Fight off hoards of monsters at night, and expand your village in the day time. Inspired by games like Black and White, Rimworld, and Dwarf Fortress but not quite like any of them.

Title: Flashman Gold
description: Flashman, Flashman Gold he is called because he is a super fast gold smith.Now his gold has been stolen by gold stealing monsters thieves and now there is only one thing to do, get the gold back!!! 30 beautiful levels, especially for people who have experienced the 80'

Title: Phantom Rose
description: Phantom Rose is a roguelike deckbuilding card game. Fight and collect powerful cards as Reina, a maid exploring a mansion ravaged by evil creatures

Title: MicroCrawl
description: Microcrawl is a bite sized point and click 2D adventure text hybrid presented from the first person in which you'll have to navigate your way through a dark fantasy world anthology that includes three seperate stories.

Title: Hell Runner
description: Fast Paced first person / third person platformer game where you try to beat each level as fast as possible. Unlock new skills on new chapters and try to find better scores on old levels with new skills as well.

Title: Santa's Gift Grab
description: Step into a snowy world with our straightforward collector's game. Featuring clean low-poly graphics and soothing Christmas tunes, your task is to help Santa gather his misplaced gifts. But be quick!

Title: Battle Bands: Rock & Roll Deckbuilder
description: Get the band together and take on the world in this battle of the bands, deckbuilding card game set in the fantasy land of Riff City. Play solo or with friends to conquer competitive real-time tournaments or offbeat bosses in a coop campaign. Wits and a sick riff are key to becoming a rock legend.

Title: Path To The Devil
description: A replayable rouge like deck building game in an RPG environment. Travel down a path across an island to face the devil. Build a strong deck on the way by taking out the devil's mercenary army and completing various non combatant encounters.

Title: Arizona Sunshine® 2
description: It's time to say hello to your old pal, Fred. Arizona Sunshine® 2, the next-gen sequel to the fan-favorite VR apocalypse, packs even more gore-geous zombie action! And what's better than braving the end of the f*cking world alone? Surviving it with your new best friend--Buddy.

Title: Grottesco Absurdus
description: Grottesco Absurdus is a bright transference crossover, absurd and chaotic. A vibrant mixture of childhood fantasies and fears becomes an unpredictable story. It's a fair deal! Join us!

Title: Chess Knights: Shinobi
description: Chess Knights: Shinobi is an original turn-based puzzle game inspired by Chess. Become a Ninja in feudal Japan and prove your skills in the art of infiltration, sabotage and assassination.

Title: It's Kooky
description: It's Kooky is a hand drawn hidden object game. Unlike any other, you will have to find those quirky characters with unusual behaviours hidden throughout the map of different locations. Have a kooky fun time!!!

Title: Hero Siege
description: Hero Siege brings you the loot with a legion of playable character classes, procedually generated world, over 1000 unique items, endless replayability and a wide variety of dungeons and dangerous zones to explore!
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG

Title: 1993 Space Machine
description: Space shooters never die. 1993 is a testament to that. 1993 is a classic shoot em up celebrating games like Gradius, R-Type and Life Force.

Title: Gems of Magic: Father's Day
description: Rescue the lost son in this Match 3 Adventure, a story of a father and son enjoying Father’s Day until things go wrong. Enjoy the hand-drawn scenes and great visuals. Make smart use of the power-ups. Remove all obstacles during the quest. Reunite father and son in over 100 levels full of challenges.

Title: In Her Eyes
description: A maiden(Meme) from another world is trying to summon you to help her prevent an assassination that is going to happen in 30 days. Your choice will not only affect your card deck and your battle style, but also affect the personality of the girl, which may lead to different ending.

Title: Jelly Express
description: Welcome to Jelly Express - the physics-based co-op game that's as cute as it is fun! Transform into wibbly-wobbly jellies, tackle all obstacles to get those packages delivered! Do it alone, or have a partner to help you out! Stretch, jump and wiggle your way to victory.

Title: Mystic Vale
description: Are you ready to lead your druidic clan and cleanse the Valley of Life? Mystic Vale is a stunning digital version of the Origins award-winning AEG card game. Debuting the unique Card Crafting System, players take turns building powerful combos in order to stop the curse. Play online or local hotseat.

Title: Glow Ball - Not A Billiard Puzzle Game
description: A complex and unusual puzzle game about a glow ball with nice graphics

Title: Sex Adventures - Swingers Gym
description: A visual novel about a hot couple trying a private gym. Everything takes a turn when a daring blonde starts hitting on the girlfriend.

Title: Bondage Girl
description: Classic hero save the United States independent games, heroes need to rescue 15 girls kidnapped by bad guys, at the same time, the hero should also pay attention to the body.
genre: Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access

Title: Monopolka
description: Standard Monopoly Game

Title: BlackJack Math
description: BlackJack Math is a game about mixing the cards to match the correct formula in order to get 21 as a result. Swap the cards in order to find the correct order to solve the puzzles.

Title: Mini Moves: Among Stars
description: Mini moves in the giant universe, simplicity is what you need to achieve your goals.

Title: 100 hidden dogs
description: Hidden object game in the alien setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. A large location and cute dogs.

Title: Mupple
description: A colorful and animated world starring sweet animals and 2D Platformer focused on obstacles and challenges seems to be a perfect mix for... Deadly traps, absurd challenges and an insane adventure. Help Bilbo on his quest to retrieve the fruits from the forest and return home

Title: Bandits
description: Bandits is a modern yet classic shared screen multiplayer Tank Battle Arena game! (Local or Remote Play) It has fully destructible environments, lots of maps, and 8 characters with unique play-styles and abilities. It has PvP Arenas and Solo Missions.

Title: Miko Adventures Puffball
description: Miko is a raccoon who lost his way while wandering through the forest, he discovers a portal and upon touching it he finds himself in a world full of dangers. Miko is transported into another dimension and your goal is to help him find a way back home but it wont be an easy journey, are you ready?

Title: Dice World
description: Dice World is a turn-based roguelike game. Create your own party by combining skills with character. You need dice to use skills, but you also need strategic dice choices depending on the situation. Collect relics and enhance your skills to defeat your enemies!

Title: INMATE: Survival
description: INMATE: Survival is an open world survival game, where you play the role of a prisoner sentenced to stay on a 4*4 km Island with many types of enemies both humans and animals.

Title: Bloody and cruel story of toys
description: A game about bloody and cruel story of toys.

Title: Alice's Patchwork
description: Assemble patchwork mosaics while you travel with Alice and the famous characters of Wonderland and Looking-Glass Land

Title: Pocket Cars
description: Pocket Cars is a fast paced arcade combat-racing game, where you can drive remote controlled cars that speed through amazing tracks.

Title: AK-xolotl
description: The cutest, deadliest and ONLY top-down roguelike shooter featuring AK-wielding Axolotls. Blast your way through the animal kingdom with an arsenal of kick-ass guns, mighty power-ups and even raise an army of trigger-happy baby axolotls.

Title: JJJ
description: "A normal vacation" the three friends were thinking, when they were drawn into a macabre ending.

Title: Wander Hero
description: This is the fantasy of a two-dimensional traverser in a different world. You can take a leisurely and strategically deep adventure. You can also collect beautiful girls without hurting your wallet, and form your own harem... ahem, mercenary group.

Title: Beach Club Simulator
description: Beach Club Simulator goes beyond just managing a beach club; it also offers an impressive social interaction and relationship system. In the game, you can engage with customers, make friends with them, and experience relationships.

Title: The Advisor - Episode 1: Royal Pain
description: The Advisor Series is a player-driven narrative where your choices & decisions, both in the game, and out of the game, determine how future episodes unfold. Play the role of villain protagonist Magnus the Magician, as he wreaks havoc across the land, one well-placed fireball at a time!

Title: Russian Prison Sport: OCHKO
description: And what will you sacrifice in order to survive? OCHKO?

Title: Last Anime Boy 2: Hentai Zombie Hell
description: In 2088, Nazi Muslims achieved great success in the field of chemical weapons and, not to fall into captivity and fight even after death with the infidels, they created a serum that turned them into zombies.

Title: The Seekers: Survival
description: After a plane crash, you are the only survivor. You will quickly find out that you are in a remote place, surrounded by unknown creatures.

Title: Pirates Outlaws
description: Pirates Outlaws is a roguelike card game in which you navigate dangerous seas and challenge their masters. Your expedition will be full of ambushes and will not be easy. Build your deck and combos to become a reputed pirate.

Title: PenBall
description: There is a ball on a small field with a top view. Your gate is at the bottom, and your opponent's gate is at the top. Your goal is to score the ball into the opponent's goal.

Title: Animal Kart Racer 2
description: Three, two, one - STEP ON IT! Anything goes in these races: Risky overtaking manoeuvres, shameless crashes and insane pile-ups. Hurtle through deep gorges, glittering diamond caves, icy polar regions and yawning canyons.

Title: NEOVERSE
description: Neoverse is a beautiful, fantastic game consisting of adventures with thrilling challenges. It is a strategic, action, rogue-lite, deck building game that will test the player’s skill. Start an adventure with unique heroes to save the world along various timelines.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy

Title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Legacy of the Duelist : Link Evolution
description: Build your Deck from over 10,000 cards and take on the most iconic Duelists from the Yu-Gi-Oh! universe. Relive the stories from the original Yu-Gi-Oh! animated series through Yu-Gi-Oh! VRAINS!

Title: Flow:The Sliding
description: Enjoy the rhythmic music and beat the SCORE!!!

Title: S.P.I.K.E: ARENA
description: If there are two cubes left in the world, one of them will want to kill another.

Title: Aby's Playground
description: Do you want to roam in an open world, discover new things, find new weapons, kill monsters and upgrade your character?

Title: Love Tavern
description: After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different girls from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Blender Bros
description: Blender Bros. is a cheerful interplanetary platform adventure with an emphasis on exploration and collecting cute little creatures called Mini Bros.

Title: Marauders
description: Marauders is a tactical first-person multiplayer looter shooter set in a sci-fi universe. As a space pirate, work solo, or in a squad with up to 3 other players to navigate a hostile battleground, hunt for loot, craft new weapons and gear, and salvage what you’ll need to survive.

Title: AvoCuddle
description: Brought to you by a sole Syrian developer, AvoCuddle tells a tale of true love! An emotional action adventure through the galaxy searching and seeking to free your soul mate. Explore beautiful and dangerous planets, fight it's special creature and solve puzzles ,through a visually stunning game.

Title: Her Heart's Desire: A Landlord Epic
description: Become a writer with a drinking problem and enjoy the debauchery when you rent out the spare bedrooms in your new house to three gorgeous women. Can you romance Daisy, Lily, and Rose? Find out in this farcical adult visual novel where you make the choices!

Title: My Time at Sandrock
description: Travel to the desert community of Sandrock and take on the role of a fledgling Builder. Use your trusty toolset to gather resources, construct machines, and turn your run-down workshop into a well-oiled production facility to save the town from the jaws of economic ruin!

Title: Moorhuhn: Tiger and Chicken
description: For the first time ever, Crazy Chicken in a major action RPG.
Publisher: Young Fun Studio by Higgs Games GmbH

Title: Blast Brawl 2
description: Fast-paced combat where any hit means DEATH! Deadly enemies and bosses to test your mettle! Champions with unique abilities and play styles!

Title: 3 days: Zoo Mystery
description: Find a stolen property, solve the enigmatic riddle and expose the villain with beautiful young Anna! You have only 3 days to unravel this complicated story, solve an old zoo mystery and help Anna and her uncle. Stop looking for a fascinating and dangerous adventure! It's already found you! Welcome to 3 Days: Zoo Mystery!

Title: Give Me Your Coins
description: Give Me Your Coins is a fast-paced platformer built on precision and momentum. Try to get out of the magic chest, go through the several dozen levels created inside his wooden body.

Title: My Girlfriend is a Musician
description: “My Girlfriend is a Musician” is a Music Tour Management Simulator and Yuri Dating Simulator. Play as an aspiring junior tour manager helming a series of concerts around Europe for an eccentric yet extremely entertaining Rockstar!

Title: Gem Rifts
description: Ancient portals have been lying dormant, waiting for daring adventurers to travel between worlds. Your task is to lead an expedition through one of these portals, research and build defenses around it, and protect it from hostile guardian life forms.

Title: Hellstuck: Rage With Your Friends
description: Get ready to rage with your friends in this co-op precise platforming adventure! You're stuck in Hell. You can only jump upwards and all you have to do is escape … it can't be that hard, right?!

Title: WikiArena
description: The "trivia roguelike" where Wikipedia articles battle it out and you predict the winner! Guess the length and popularity of articles randomly pulled from Wikipedia's daily growing archive of 6.5+ million entries! Featuring arena, endless and a WikiBot duel mode, no two runs will ever be the same!

Title: Rise of the Slime
description: Be the hero that no-one saw coming. Help Slime defy the odds by playing insanely powerful cards in this charming, relaxing and strategic deckbuilding adventure.

Title: The Riese Project - Prologue
description: The Riese Project - Prologue is an adventure VR game you'll never forget. Immerse yourself in a universe full of intriguing puzzles, explore real locations created using the latest Lumen and Nanite technologies employed by Unreal Engine 5

Title: Reign of the Succubus
description: Reign of the Succubus is an RPG that takes place on the Island of Eden, where it is rumored that all of one's desires shall be fulfilled. But is this true or merely a rumor? Find out in this RPG developed by TechnoBrake and published by Kagura Games!

Title: Buissons
description: Take control of a bush and challenge your friends in a hide and seek game up to 4 players. Move at night and use the day as an opportunity to observe and beat your opponents. Use the secrets of nature to trap them. Get ready to laugh!

Title: The Last One
description: Once a prosperous city Istanbul is fallen. Prepare your gear, defeat zombie hordes and reclaim your hometown. Uncover hidden story behind the disaster and learn what controls the zombies. Select your side between military and rebels and fight for the control of the city.

Title: GosickRogue
description: Gothic × Sickがテーマのデッキ構築型ローグライト。10枚のカードを入れ替えながらデッキを強化。攻撃をして敵を倒すか、防御に徹して耐えるか、2通りの戦略を上手く活用しよう。

Title: Somnipathy
description: Somnipathy is a story focused point-and-click horror adventure. Help Aggy overcome nightmares, earn upgrades during the day, and survive another night in dungeons themed after sleep disorders like Sleep Paralysis, Restless Leg syndrome, and more.

Title: ICE AGENT
description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) are responsible for preventing illegal immigration and preventing the unlawful traffic of goods into the US. Have you ever thought what it would be like to be one of those agents? What choices they have to make on daily basis?

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Zero no Kiseki Kai
description: Set in the autonomous region of Crossbell, the epic RPG Zero no Kiseki: Kai, which tells the story of the Special Support Section, is now available on Steam! The Steam version features 60 fps support + high definition picture & sound for an enhanced gameplay experience!

Title: Adventure Time: Pirates of the Enchiridion
description: Ahoy! The Land of Ooo is underwater and it’s up to Finn and Jake to find out why. Join our heroes as they explore the high seas, search for hidden clues, interrogate shady suspects and fight pirates to solve the mystery and save their waterlogged world!

Title: Heaven Forest - VR MMO
description: The pressing human questions about life depend directly on our attitudes toward the universe. You'll find the answers you're searching for through a series of reasonings and clues during your journey in this game as well as in your own life.

Title: Commando Hero
description: Hero who wants to be a commando has to pass difficult tracks. Finish the track fast and enter the Leaderboard.

Title: Elkabir
description: This game represents characters in real life from Egyptian actors to live the reality of the Egyptian characters, and the shape of the characters has been developed with high quality, and three stages have been developed, some of which contain reliance on intelligence, planning speedand response.

Title: Flapping Over It
description: You will not pass this game, as the failure will always haunt you.

Title: Quickflash - A Fabula Story
description: A strategy, turn-based fantasy game in the worlds of darkness and light.

Title: Dungeon 100
description: The dragon-slayer becomes the dragon. Create unique builds without having to grind for equipment. After defeating a dungeon boss, you will take its place. Then, defeat your past selves to descend further into the dungeon.

Title: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour China
description: Tea ceremonies, ancient temples and red dragons! Put your puzzles together and embark on a colourful and unforgettable journey through the multifaceted China.

Title: Unmoor
description: Louisa had spent her entire life at sea with her father, sailing aboard the ship called "The Diossa", and she had no intention of changing that. But upon returning home from the Maritime Academy, she discovered that her father had been deceived by a certain Monsieur Viardo, who had taken the ship into his possession.

Title: Frontline Zed
description: Defend your fortified barricade by night, collect weapons and conduct repairs by day. Survive long enough to make your way through America and towards rescue.

Title: Sandmade
description: Look closely and imagine, do those structures fit together? Sandmade is a beautiful puzzle game that starts simple and relaxing but will soon challenge your brain and test your spatial skills. How good are you at visualising objects in your mind? Immerse yourself in the world of sand shapes and find out.

Title: Toaster Defense
description: Smash and shoot down robots in this challenging fast-paced game that mixes tower defense and shoot 'em up platforming. Build lamps, fans, and meat tenderizers to aid in your defenses and find the deadliest combination. Do you have what it takes to defend the world's cutest toaster?!

Title: No One Survived
description: This is a multiplayer cooperative open world construction survival sandbox game, where you and your friends must find supplies and build shelters in this world. You have to keep an eye on your character's needs state at all times, a bad state is likely to lead to death.

Title: Rift Wizard 2
description: Rift Wizard 2 is a tough as nails traditional roguelike wizard simulator. You play as an immortal amnesiac wizard who must journey through the cosmos to defeat his nemesis. Each run, you'll build a unique repertoire of spells, passive skills, and magical artifacts.

Title: Dwarven Skykeep
description: A unique blend of base- and deckbuilding wrapped in a medieval fantasy universe and humorous plot. Build and defend your towers using magical cards. Win artifacts to obtain immense power. Complete challenges, adapt to RNG and conditions of five worlds to become a master wizard!

Title: Bully: Scholarship Edition
description: Bully tells the story of mischievous 15-year-old Jimmy Hopkins as he goes through the hilarity and awkwardness of adolescence. Beat the jocks at dodge ball, play pranks on the preppies, save the nerds, kiss the girl and navigate the social hierarchy in the worst school around.

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki IV -THE END OF SAGA-
description: THE LEGEND OF HEROES: SEN NO KISEKI IV -THE END OF SAGA, the final chapter of the story-driven RPG series SEN NO KISEKI, is finally here!

Title: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki II KAI -The Erebonian Civil War-

Title: Blood 'n Bikinis

Titan Attacks has the same easy-to-learn and addictive gameplay of the classic arcade shoot 'em up, but is packed full of extras - new features, new...
